books.title: Roughing It
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: Mark Twain’s semiautobiographical account of his travel across the United States.

books.title: The Sea Hawk
books.author: Rafael Sabatini
books.summary: A Cornish gentleman becomes a Barbary corsair and seeks vengeance on the jealous half brother who betrayed him.

books.title: Narrative of the Life of Frederick Douglass
books.author: Frederick Douglass
books.summary: Frederick Douglass describes his youth as a slave in Maryland and his desire to be a free man.

books.title: Eminent Victorians
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: Four witty and biting biographies of Victorians that take aim at the moral superiority of their subject’s time.

books.title: Just So Stories
books.author: Rudyard Kipling
books.summary: A collection of short humorous fables for children, most purporting to tell the origin of animal characteristics such as the camel’s hump.

books.title: A Damsel in Distress
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A composer meets a young woman and tracks her down to a country manor, where a case of mistaken identity leads to comedy.

books.title: Man and Superman
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: Jack Tanner flees both London and responsibility when he is made guardian of his childhood friend Ann Whitehead.

books.title: The Gods of Mars
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: John Carter returns to Mars to try and determine the fate of his lost love Dejah Thoris.

books.title: The Way of All Flesh
books.author: Samuel Butler
books.summary: Four generations of the Pontifex family grow to adulthood in Victorian England, encountering challenges that satirize the era along the way.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Frank Belknap Long
books.summary: A collection of short fiction by Frank Belknap Long, ordered by date of original publication.

books.title: My Disillusionment in Russia
books.author: Emma Goldman
books.summary: Emma Goldman recounts her experiences living in the early Soviet Union.

books.title: The Dain Curse
books.author: Dashiell Hammett
books.summary: A detective assigned to investigate a diamond theft finds himself entangled by a family curse.

books.title: The Problems of Philosophy
books.author: Bertrand Russell
books.summary: A beginner’s guide to problems in various fields of philosophy.

books.title: Beyond Good and Evil
books.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
books.summary: Nietzsche’s philosophical treatise on the ambiguity of traditional morality.

books.title: The Canterbury Tales
books.author: Geoffrey Chaucer
books.summary: A group of pilgrims trade tales as they travel through medieval England.

books.title: Those Barren Leaves
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.summary: An aristocrat summons a group of “intelligentsia” to vacation in her Italian mansion.

books.title: Omega
books.author: Camille Flammarion
books.summary: A comet threatens to collide with the Earth, perhaps bringing about the end of the world.

books.title: Fifty-One Tales
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A series of otherworldly short stories ranging from the moral to the whimsical.

books.title: Tao Te Ching
books.author: Laozi
books.summary: One of the fundamental texts of the Tao philosophy and religion.

books.title: Essays
books.author: Henry David Thoreau
books.summary: A collection of Henry David Thoreau’s essays.
